input.sentences: i found a photo album in my grandma 's attic .
it contained pictures of people i 've never met .
my grandma told me [female] was her mother .
it contained pictures and information on my entire family history .
it made me appreciate my family more .
output.sentences: I can't believe this photo my grandma found.
It was pictures of people she had met throughout her life.
It told the story of how my mother was born to my grandmother.
The pictures showed the information of valuable family history.
It was a story of her life and of my family.
